external_games.name: Konchuu Ouja Mushiking: Greatest Champion he no Michi

name: Konchuu Ouja Mushiking: Greatest Champion he no Michi
summary: Kouchuu Ouja Mushiking: Greatest Champion e no Michi is an action game for the Gameboy Advance. It is based on the Japanese card game Mushi King where players do battle using beetle-like monsters.
